personal.name: Yen Wee Lim
personal.title: I build AI systems and full-stack software that
personal.titleClosing: . 15+ production agents, data platforms at national scale, and apps running on RM50/month AWS.
personal.whatsappMessage: Hi Yen Wee, I came across your portfolio and would like to discuss a project.

testimonials.quote: Yen Wee took our AI platform from a concept deck to a production system with 15 agents in under a year. The 80% improvement in MLOps efficiency wasn't just a metric -- it changed how our entire team works.
testimonials.name: Director

testimonials.quote: We needed someone who could handle both the ML models and the 6TB data infrastructure underneath. Yen Wee delivered production-grade systems that our team still relies on daily. His statistical rigor sets him apart from typical engineers.
testimonials.name: CTO

testimonials.quote: The e-invoicing system he built costs us less than RM100/month and handles our entire sales pipeline. What impressed me most was his ability to translate technical concepts into terms our team could actually understand. Fast delivery, clean handoff.
testimonials.name: Founder

metadata.title: Yen Wee Lim - AI Solutions Architect | Production AI Systems & Data Platforms
metadata.description: AI engineer and full-stack developer shipping production systems. 15+ AI agents, 6TB data platforms, full-stack apps. Based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
metadata.author: Yen Wee Lim
metadata.ogTitle: Yen Wee Lim - AI Solutions Architect | Production AI Systems & Data Platforms
metadata.ogDescription: AI engineer and full-stack developer shipping production systems. 15+ AI agents, 6TB data platforms, full-stack apps. Based in KL, Malaysia.

intro.description: Whether you need production AI agents, scalable data platforms, or full-stack applications -- I ship systems that deliver measurable results. Let's discuss your next project.

services.title: AI Agents & LLM Systems
services.description: 15+ LangGraph agents in production -- data mining, report generation, deep research. Each with bounded autonomy, human-in-the-loop gates, and structured observability.

services.title: Full-Stack Applications
services.description: End-to-end web apps from frontend to deployment. Latest: a serverless invoicing system on RM50/month AWS. FastAPI + Next.js, designed for clean handoff.

services.title: Data & MLOps Platforms
services.description: Built a 6TB PostgreSQL warehouse with daily ETL at Credit Bureau Malaysia. Model retraining, feature stores, Airflow pipelines -- at national scale.

services.title: Dashboards & Analytics
services.description: Dashboards for 300+ Shopee stakeholders. Automated competitor analysis on 600K daily records. Analytics tools that replace manual work, not just visualize it.

highlights: Built AiMod, an agentic AI platform with 15+ production agents, improving MLOps efficiency 80%
Shipped autonomous data-mining workflows, RAG report generation, and generative BI dashboards
Led product from concept to production as Malaysia's first homegrown AI DataOps platform
Built 6TB data warehouse with daily ETL pipelines serving national credit risk models
Developed Income Estimation (MAPE ~25%) and Loan Screening models (AUC 0.75) deployed via FastAPI
Spearheaded internal MLOps platform for on-demand model retraining with automated feature selection
Built dashboards for 300+ stakeholders covering profitability and key account management
Automated competitor pricing analysis processing 600K records daily
Modeled recommendation engine that eliminated 100+ hours/week of manual curation

education.achievements: President's List — 2 Semesters, Dean's List — 4 Semesters

story.heading: My Path
story.text: From actuarial science to AI engineering. I spent years building financial models where precision isn't optional before moving into production AI systems. The statistical rigor stuck.

connect.callDescription: 30-minute intro call. No pitch, just a conversation about your project.
connect.pricingSignal: Project scoping & freelance rates available on request.
